metadata.title: CVE-2023-38409 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in set_con2fb_map indrivers/video/fbdev/core/fbcon.c in the Linux kernel before 6.2.12. Becausean assignment occurs only for the first vc, the fbcon_registered_fb andfbcon_display arrays can be desynchronized in fbcon_mode_deleted (thecon2fb_map points at the old fb_info).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required
